lyrics: So this is XmasAnd what have you doneAnother year overA new one just begunAnd so this is ChristmasI hope you have funThe near and the dear onesThe old and the youngA very merry XmasAnd a happy New YearLet's hope it's a good oneWithout any fearAnd, so this is XmasFor weak and for strongThe rich and the poor onesThe road is so longSo happy ChristmasFor black and for whiteFor yellow and red onesLet's stop all the fightA very merry XmasAnd a happy New YearLet's hope it's a good oneWithout any fearAnd, so this is XmasAnd what have we doneAnother year overAnd a new one just begunAnd so Happy XmasAnd we hope you have funThe near and the dear onesThe old and the youngA very merry XmasAnd a happy New YearLet's hope it's a good oneWithout any fearWar is over, if you want itWar is over now, etcHappy Xmas
